abstract: Ngmoco, a video game developer devoted to the iPhone, raised $10 million from venture firms including Norwest Venture Partners and Kleiner Perkins.
snippet: Ngmoco, a video game developer devoted to the iPhone, raised $10 million from venture firms including Norwest Venture Partners and Kleiner Perkins.
lead_paragraph: Of all the weird and wacky video games available for the iPhone, perhaps the strangest is Rolando. In the game, which costs $5 in the Apple App store, the player tilts the device and forth to manipulate a smiling ball rolling through a colorful, Super-Mario-like world, accompanied by some vigorous rhythms and some very Japanese animation.

abstract: A new campaign for Mott’s apple juice involves various plot lines from “Desperate Housewives,” with the show’s characters sharing -- or concealing -- shocking secrets.
snippet: A new campaign for Mott’s apple juice involves various plot lines from “Desperate Housewives,” with the show’s characters sharing -- or concealing -- shocking secrets.
lead_paragraph: They say that desperate times call for desperate measures. They also, it seems, call for desperate housewives -- one at a time, if not en masse.

headline.main: TV Housewife Asks, ‘How Do You Like Them Apples?’
